Regulation Name(s): Immunomagnetic Circulating Cancer Cell Selection and Enumeration System
Analyte(s): Circulating tumor cells of epithelial origin (CD45-, EpCAM+, cytokeratins 8, 18+, and/or 19+)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CellSearch Circulating Tumor Cell Kit using immunomagnetic separation and fluorescence to enumerate circulating tumor cells in whole blood for monitoring metastatic breast cancer.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for enumeration of circulating tumor cells of epithelial origin in whole blood; presence of CTC is associated with decreased progression free and overall survival in metastatic breast cancer patients; test is used as an aid in monitoring these patients with serial testing in conjunction with other clinical methods.
